name: Sandy Scoops
description:
If performance is poor on the web version, please try the desktop build which runs much better.

Dig for coins in the sand and save up enough to buy some ice cream! Hurry though as the ice cream stand closes at 5 pm!

Controls:
  • Left-click: Dig and select objects with your pointer finger
  • Right-click: Dig using two fingers or your whole hand (only if unlocked)
  • SPACE: Punch the sand to scare crabs (only if unlocked)
  • ESC: Pause

Click the button in the bottom right to access the shop.

Tips:
  • Make sure to buy the ice cream before 5 pm!
  • Poking crabs or blue bottles will hurt you!
  • Buying the "Armour" will protect you from crabs and blue bottles (the jellyfish things) when using just your pointer finger. 
  • Change or mute the volume by clicking the speaker icon on the main menu/pause menu.

Made for LOWREZJAM2021

Credits Game/Art/SFX by Charlton Lane Music by Kevin MacLeod
